source_description: Feature "steerability"/"adaptability" (steerability is more correct). @roadmap.md package 4 explains it, there was also a research done on how the current version of it is implemented'/home/maksym/Work/proj/Problemologist/Problemologist-AI/specs/wp4_research_report.md.
